actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1313.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12536 to provide for increases in appropriations ceilings, development ceilings, land acquisition, and boundary changes in certain Federal park and recreation areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 12536 (Public parks and recreation areas).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12536 to provide for increases in appropriations ceilings, development ceilings, land acquisition, and boundary changes in certain Federal park and recreation areas, and for other purposes.
